abilities.name: Fire
abilities.desc: Allows unit to cast Fire. If Fire is already available, then unit can cast it twice as often.

abilities.name: Miasma Δ
abilities.desc: Allows unit to cast Miasma Δ. If Miasma Δ is already available, then unit can cast it twice as often.

abilities.name: Heal
abilities.desc: Allows unit to cast Heal. If Heal is already available, then unit can cast it twice as often.

abilities.name: Renewal
abilities.desc: Unit recovers up to 20% of max HP at the start of each turn.

abilities.name: Catnap
abilities.desc: If unit takes no action except Wait, recovers up to 10% of max HP.

abilities.name: Goody Basket
abilities.desc: Chance to recover up to 10% of max HP at the start of each turn. Trigger % = Lck stat.

abilities.name: Songstress
abilities.desc: Adjacent allies recover up to 10% of max HP at the start of each turn.

abilities.name: Hunter’s Boon
abilities.desc: Grants Crit +20 when foe’s HP is ? 50%.

abilities.name: Poison Strike
abilities.desc: If unit initiates combat and lands a hit, targeted foe loses up to 20% of max HP after combat.

abilities.name: Live to Serve
abilities.desc: When healing an ally with white magic, unit recovers the same amount of HP.

abilities.name: Lifetaker
abilities.desc: Unit recovers HP equal to 50% of damage dealt after defeating a foe.

abilities.name: Survival Instinct
abilities.desc: If unit initiates combat and defeats foe, grants Str/Mag/Dex/Spd +4 for one turn.

abilities.name: Lethality
abilities.desc: Chance to instantly kill a foe when dealing damage. Trigger % = 0.25×Dex.

abilities.name: Poison
abilities.desc: Chance to inflict poison on foe when dealing damage. Trigger % = Dex stat.

abilities.name: Pavise
abilities.desc: Chance to reduce sword/lance/axe/brawling damage by half. Trigger % = Dex stat.

abilities.name: Aegis
abilities.desc: Chance to reduce bow/magic damage by half. Trigger % = Dex stat.

abilities.name: Miracle
abilities.desc: Chance to survive lethal damage with 1 HP, if HP is > 1. Trigger % = Lck stat.

abilities.name: Terrain Resistance
abilities.desc: Nullifies damage from terrain.

abilities.name: Special Dance
abilities.desc: When using the Dance ability, grant Dex/Spd/Lck +4 to target ally.

abilities.name: Paragon
abilities.desc: Doubles experience earned.

abilities.name: Professor’s Guidance
abilities.desc: Multiplies this unit’s and adjacent allies’ experience earned by 1.2.

abilities.name: Discipline
abilities.desc: Doubles skill experience earned in battle.

abilities.name: Aptitude
abilities.desc: Makes each stat 20% more likely to increase on level up.

abilities.name: Vantage
abilities.desc: When foe initiates combat, unit still attacks first if HP is ≤ 50%.

abilities.name: Missing Number
abilities.desc: Missing Number (icon is based on Wary Fighter)

abilities.name: Desperation
abilities.desc: If unit initiates combat with HP ≤ 50%, unit’s follow-up attack (if possible) occurs before foe’s counterattack.

abilities.name: Quick Riposte
abilities.desc: If foe initiates combat while unit’s HP is ≥ 50%, unit makes guaranteed follow-up attack.

abilities.name: Wrath
abilities.desc: If foe initiates combat while unit’s HP is ≤ 50%, grants Crit +50.

abilities.name: Dance
abilities.desc: Use Dance to allow an ally to move again.

abilities.name: Steal
abilities.desc: Allows unit to steal a non-weapon item from a foe with a lower Spd stat.

abilities.name: Locktouch
abilities.desc: Allows unit to open doors and chests without keys.

abilities.name: Stealth
abilities.desc: Makes it more difficult for foes to target unit.

abilities.name: Canto
abilities.desc: Allows unit to move again after completing certain actions, if there is movement remaining.

abilities.name: Pass
abilities.desc: Allows unit to pass through spaces occupied by foes.

abilities.name: Swordbreaker
abilities.desc: Grants Hit/Avo +20 when using a lance against sword users.

abilities.name: Lancebreaker
abilities.desc: Grants Hit/Avo +20 when using an axe against lance users.

abilities.desc: Grants Hit/Avo +20 when using a sword against axe users.

abilities.name: Unsealable Magic
abilities.desc: Prevents unit from being silenced.

abilities.name: Immune Status
abilities.desc: Nullifies status effects and debuffs.

abilities.name: General
abilities.desc: Nullifies instant death effects and halves damage from enemy gambits.

abilities.name: Commander
abilities.desc: Nullifies instant death effects, status effects, and movement effects, and greatly reduces damage from enemy gambits.

abilities.name: Infinite Magic
abilities.desc: Removes the limitation on the number of times magic can be used.

abilities.name: Magic Bind
abilities.desc: If unit lands a hit, targeted foe is unable to use magic for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Infantry Effect Null
abilities.desc: Cancels effectiveness against infantry units.

abilities.name: Armored Effect Null
abilities.desc: Nullifies any extra effectiveness against armored units.

abilities.name: Cavalry Effect Null
abilities.desc: Nullifies any extra effectiveness against cavalry units.

abilities.name: Flying Effect Null
abilities.desc: Nullifies any extra effectiveness against fliers.

abilities.name: Dragon Effect Null
abilities.desc: Cancels effectiveness against dragons.

abilities.name: Monster Effect Null
abilities.desc: Nullifies any extra effectiveness against monsters.

abilities.name: Effect Null
abilities.desc: Cancels all types of effectiveness.

abilities.name: Air of Intimidation
abilities.desc: On Hold

abilities.name: Vital Defense
abilities.desc: Makes critical hits against this unit impossible.

abilities.name: Giant Wings
abilities.desc: Grants Avo +30 against sword, lance, or axe users.

abilities.name: Anti-Magic Armor
abilities.desc: Nullifies damage from magic attacks.

abilities.name: Divine Dragon Horn
abilities.desc: Unit recovers 100% of HP at the start of each turn if a White Beast is within 10 spaces.

abilities.name: Path of the Conqueror
abilities.desc: On Hold

abilities.name: Noncombatant
abilities.desc: Unit cannot be targeted by foes.

abilities.name: Battalion Desperation
abilities.desc: If unit initiates combat when battalion endurance is ≤ 1/3, unit’s follow-up attack (if possible) occurs before foe’s counterattack.

abilities.name: Cursed Power
abilities.desc: Unit recovers HP on swamp terrain.

abilities.name: Anchor
abilities.desc: Prevents unit from being moved.

abilities.name: Counterattack
abilities.desc: Allows unit to counterattack regardless of distance to attacker.

abilities.name: Twin Crests
abilities.desc: Allows unit to take two actions in one turn.

abilities.name: Ancient Dragon Wrath
abilities.desc: Calculates damage using the lower of foe’s Prt or Rsl.

abilities.name: Surging Light
abilities.desc: Performs Staggering Blow immediately.

abilities.name: Ancient Dragonskin
abilities.desc: Halves all damage taken, negates some abilities and combat arts, and prevents unit from being moved.

abilities.name: Keen Intuition
abilities.desc: Grants Avo +30 during combat with a foe 2 or more spaces away.

abilities.name: Staunch Shield
abilities.desc: If unit takes no action except Wait, grants Def +4 for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Lone Wolf

abilities.name: Fighting Spirit
abilities.desc: Unit takes 5 less damage when no battalion is assigned or when battalion endurance is 0.

abilities.name: Confidence
abilities.desc: Grants Hit/Avo +15 when unit is at full HP.

abilities.name: Persecution Complex
abilities.desc: Grants Atk +5 when unit is not at full HP.

abilities.name: Animal Friend

abilities.desc: Use Rally to grant Str +4 to an ally.

abilities.name: Crest Scholar
abilities.desc: Use Rally to grant Mag +4 to an ally.

abilities.name: Compassion
abilities.desc: Use Rally to grant Lck +8 to an ally.

abilities.desc: Allows unit to open doors and chests without keys.

abilities.name: Battalion Vantage
abilities.desc: When foe initiates combat, unit still attacks first if battalion endurance is ≤ 1/3.

abilities.name: Battalion Wrath
abilities.desc: If foe initiates combat while unit’s battalion endurance is ≤ 1/3, grants Crit +50.

abilities.name: Battalion Renewal

abilities.desc: Quadruples the number of uses for dark magic.

abilities.name: White Magic Uses Up+
abilities.desc: Quadruples the number of uses for white magic.

abilities.name: 10 Elites

abilities.name: Alert Stance+
abilities.desc: If unit takes no action except Wait, grants Avo +30 for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Close Counter

abilities.name: Professor’s Guidance+
abilities.desc: Unit deals 2 extra damage during combat. Multiplies this unit’s and adjacent allies’ experience earned by 1.2.

abilities.name: Imperial Lineage+

abilities.name: Royal Lineage+

abilities.name: Leicester Lineage+

abilities.name: Murderous Intent
abilities.desc: If unit initiates combat, grants Hit +20 during combat.

abilities.name: Sacred Power

abilities.name: Agarthan Technology
